content.rendered:
YOUR LAUNCH

INTO THE NEW SPACE

The demand for satellite-based real-time data is enormous. Soon, satellite networks will form the backbone of the Space Connectivity. Anyone seeking to understand the Earth in real-time must go into space. The potential applications of the “New Space” are dependent on the quicker and more cost-effective serial production of rockets. 

OUR VISION

YOUR LAUNCH

INTO THE NEW SPACE

We facilitate your ambitious business and scientific goals in the New Space. The demand for satellite-based real-time data is enormous. Anyone seeking to understand the Earth in real-time must go into space. The potential applications of the “New Space” are dependent on the quicker and more cost-effective serial production of rockets. 
OUR VISION

WE BUILD ROCKETS

JUST LIKE CARS

We build the best and most affordable rockets and microlaunchers. Our engine technology is revolutionary and far superior. We maximize the cost advantages of serial production because we build rockets just like cars. 

OUR MISSION

ENJOY OUR LAST MILE

DELIVERY SERVICE

Surpassing others, we position customers in their final destinations with our last mile delivery service. We facilitate ambitious business and scientific goals in the New Space for our customers. First things first, before going beyond.
LAUNCHER

STAGED COMBUSTION HOT FIRE

THERMAL STEADY - STATE ACHIEVED

We have successfully conducted an eight second hot fire test of our full-scale staged-combustion engine. Ignition, steady-state operation and controlled engine shutdown were nominal. With thermal steady-state achieved across the full engine assembly, the engine is ready to operate at full duration.

WATCH

STAGED COMBUSTION HOT FIRE

THERMAL STEADY - STATE ACHIEVED

We have successfully conducted an eight second hot fire test of our full-scale staged-combustion engine. Ignition, steady-state operation and controlled engine shutdown were nominal. With thermal steady-state achieved across the full engine assembly, the engine is ready to operate at full duration.

WATCH
